project_abstract.cdata: The proposed loan would help finance: (a) the construction of new port facilities at Pisco consisting of a four berth marginal wharf and related facilities; (b) feasibility studies in connection with the ocean port of Chimbote and four river ports; (c) improving port operations and procedures, including carrying out personnel training.
